Translations.Text: Half de gxi a malpli malpli
Aux a malpli plur Leg Quran kovr kovr
meditation je nokt est effective righteous
Vi hav a lot de temp tag ali materi
Vi commemorate nom your Lord ven ever closer closer al Him
Lord de orient okcident; tie ne est ali di Him. Vi choose Him your advokat
Kaj ceter steadfast en des vizagx de their utterances disregard them en nice manier
let Me deal kun rejectors generously ben; just don them a malpli temp
Food ke hardly hirund painful retribution
Tag ven when ter mont quake mont turn into weightless pile
Ni hav send al vi messenger just as ni send al Pharaoh messenger
Pharaoh disobeyed messenger consequently ni pun him severely
Vi disbelieve kiel vi evade tag tial terrible ti gxi far infants gray-haired
heaven frakas therefrom His promes est ver
This est reminder; whoever vol let him choose path al his Lord
